entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9 except minus 14 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9 except minus 14 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm inland. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
